name: Element
description: Element is a realtime strategy space game for people who don't have time to play realtime strategy space games. Generate energy, mine element, build attack and defence units, and destroy the enemy while maintaining a balance between earth, air and water.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+, 7, 8, 10 (32 or 64bit) Processor: Intel/AMD with SSE2 support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Shader model 4.0+ DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum vertical resolution 640px, 720p+ recommended.
